column2: I am Apollo! Bow down and Worship me!
Never!
Who is Apollo?
I don't believe you are Apollo.
How shall we worship you?
(Lie) You are a god, and entitled to our worship. We will gladly obey
(Truth) You are a god, and entitled to our worship. We will gladly obey
Then I will show you my power and convince you!
Don't you know your gods of old anymore? Once we walked upon your planet, and you prayed to us, offered us sacrifices and we in turn loved you
How dare you! I can squash you like bugs, right where you stand!
(Lie) I am sorry, I believe you
(Truth) I am sorry, I believe you
Bring it on!
Dance, sing, pray, and bring me sacrifices!
Ok, I can do that
What? No way!
Do not lie to me!
(Lie) That wasn't a lie, honestly!
I am sorry
Then bring me sacrifices, and amuse me!
Your insolence is beyond even my patience! Now you will suffer!
